association.translation[0].definitions[0: an organization that consists of a group of people who have the same aims, do the same kind of work etc
association.translation[0].definitions[1: a relationship with a particular person, organization, group etc
his close association with the Green Party
association.translation[0].definitions[2: a connection or relationship between two events, ideas, situations etc
the strong association between the disease and middle-aged women
association.translation[0].definitions[3: a feeling or memory that is related to a particular place, event, word etc
Scotland has all kinds of happy associations for me.
association.translation[1].definitions[0: a group of people or organizations who have the same aims or do the same kind of work
the National Association of Purchasing Managers
